scripts.dist: npm run build; npm run dist-publish
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile
scripts.dist-test: npm run build && mocha --timeout 60000 -r ts-node/register tests/test-*.ts
scripts.dist-test-provider: npm run build && mocha --timeout 60000 -r ts-node/register tests/test-0500-provider.ts
scripts.dist-test-wallet: npm run build && mocha --timeout 60000 -r ts-node/register tests/test-0200-wallet.ts
scripts.dist-test-kyc: npm run build && mocha --timeout 60000 -r ts-node/register tests/test-0100-kyc.ts
scripts.dist-test-kyc-bulk: npm run build && mocha --timeout 60000 -r ts-node/register tests/test-0101-kyc-bulk.ts
scripts.dist-test-fungible-token: npm run build && mocha --timeout 60000 -r ts-node/register tests/test-03*.ts
scripts.dist-test-fungible-token-fix: npm run build && mocha --timeout 60000 -r ts-node/register tests/test-0300-fungible-token-fix.ts
scripts.dist-test-fungible-token-dyn: npm run build && mocha --timeout 60000 -r ts-node/register tests/test-0310-fungible-token-dyn.ts
scripts.dist-test-non-fungible-token: npm run build && mocha --timeout 60000 -r ts-node/register tests/test-0800-non-fungible-token.ts
scripts.dist-test-alias: npm run build && mocha --timeout 60000 -r ts-node/register tests/test-0400-alias.ts
scripts.dist-test-utils: npm run build && mocha --timeout 60000 -r ts-node/register tests/test-0600-utils.ts
scripts.dist-test-object: npm run build && mocha --timeout 60000 -r ts-node/register tests/test-0601-object.ts
scripts.dist-test-crypto: npm run build && mocha --timeout 60000 -r ts-node/register tests/test-0610-crypto.ts
scripts.dist-test-constants: npm run build && mocha --timeout 60000 -r ts-node/register tests/test-0610-constants.ts
scripts.dist-debug-provider: npm run build && mocha --inspect-brk --timeout 3000000 -r ts-node/register tests/test-0500-provider.ts
scripts.dist-debug-wallet: npm run build && mocha --inspect-brk --timeout 3000000 -r ts-node/register tests/test-0200-wallet.ts
scripts.dist-debug-kyc: npm run build && mocha --inspect-brk --timeout 3000000 -r ts-node/register tests/test-0100-kyc.ts
scripts.dist-debug-kyc-bulk: npm run build && mocha --inspect-brk --timeout 3000000 -r ts-node/register tests/test-0101-kyc-bulk.ts
scripts.dist-debug-non-fungible-token: npm run build && mocha --inspect-brk --timeout 3000000 -r ts-node/register tests/test-0800-non-fungible-token.ts
scripts.dist-debug-fungible-token-fix: npm run build && mocha --inspect-brk --timeout 3000000 -r ts-node/register tests/test-0300-fungible-token-fix.ts
scripts.dist-debug-fungible-token-dyn: npm run build && mocha --inspect-brk --timeout 3000000 -r ts-node/register tests/test-0310-fungible-token-dyn.ts
scripts.dist-debug-alias: npm run build && mocha --inspect-brk --timeout 3000000 -r ts-node/register tests/test-0400-alias.ts
scripts.dist-debug-utils: npm run build && mocha --inspect-brk --timeout 3000000 -r ts-node/register tests/test-0600-utils.ts
scripts.dist-debug-crypto: npm run build && mocha --inspect-brk --timeout 3000000 -r ts-node/register tests/test-0610-crypto.ts
scripts.dist-debug-constants: npm run build && mocha --inspect-brk --timeout 3000000 -r ts-node/register tests/test-0610-constants.ts
